postCreateCommand: sudo -E container setup && sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /usr/local/share/nvm
postStartCommand:
bash -c 'source /usr/local/share/nvm/nvm.sh && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && npm install -g @google/gemini-cli && (grep -q "source /usr/local/share/nvm/nvm.sh" ~/.bashrc || echo -e "
# NVM initialization added by devcontainer postStartCommand
export NVM_DIR="/usr/local/share/nvm"
[ -s "\$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "\$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" # This loads nvm
[ -s "\$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "\$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" # This loads nvm bash_completion" >> ~/.bashrc) && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y xdg-utils && sudo -E container launch'
